scripts.dev: docker-compose -f docker-compose-dev.yml build --no-cache web && docker-compose -f docker-compose-dev.yml build --no-cache mongo-seed && docker-compose -f docker-compose-dev.yml up --renew-anon-volumes
scripts.qa: docker-compose -f docker-compose-qa.yml build --no-cache web && docker-compose up --renew-anon-volumes
scripts.prod: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml build --no-cache web && docker-compose up --renew-anon-volumes
